programme.title: Jingle Bell Run
programme.desc: Self-described bookworm Avery is paired with retired hockey star Wes to compete in a holiday race across America. The team struggles through themed challenges until romance runs its course.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia becomes a doting mother when Dorothy accepts a lucrative corporate teaching job.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy and Stan are ordered by a judge to inhabit one of their substandard apartments.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy replaces Blanche as the center of attention for the men at Blanche's favorite nightspot.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche throws a men-only moonlight madness party; Sophia tries to reverse a witch's hex on Dorothy.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Barbra Jean spar in self-defense class; Brock and Van install an alarm system and allow Jake to pick the secret password.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean is the high bidder in a school auction, winning Reba as her personal assistant for a day; Van's popularity with bidders makes Cheyenne jealous.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: After a near-death experience, Reba decides to put her personal matters in order and write a will; Reba discovers that Cheyenne and Van have asked Brock and Barbra Jean to be Elizabeth's guardian if something should happen to them.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brock and Barbra Jean tell Reba they are buying a nearby house; troubled Reba tries to come up with the cash she needs to send Kyra to England and Cheyenne to summer school.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The media frenzy surrounding Maris' murder trial gives Niles celebrity, making Frasier increasingly jealous.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Station staffers vie to lose the most weight for charity; Eddie observes a pigeon; Daphne keeps injuring Niles in her sleep.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Fearing a lawsuit, Frasier takes in Ann (Julia Sweeney); Niles attempts to stop an embarrassing portrait of himself from being published.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: When Ronee finds out that Martin mistakenly invited Frasier along on their weekend getaway, she invites Niles and Daphne as well.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam tries to sabotage Rebecca's efforts to operate a successful tea-room in what was formerly his pool-room; Woody's chili is a hit.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Cliff tells Carla that he is one of the judges in the Miss Boston barmaid contest, and that if she wants to win, she must be nice to him, even if it kills her.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Kyra contemplates moving in with Brock and Barbra Jean; Cheyenne and Van make plans to use Kyra's room as a nursery.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: The entire family must deal with the fact that Kyra is leaving the home to go live with Brock and Barbara Jean.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: The entire family must deal with the fact that Kyra is leaving the home to go live with Brock and Barbara Jean.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba feels closer than ever to Kyra since she moved in with Brock and Barbra Jean, especially because Kyra is driving them crazy.

programme.title: Love on the Air
programme.desc: Sonia moves to Chicago to be with her boyfriend and starts a new radio gig. When her relationship ends, she confides in a competing shock jock and the two become rivals. When they are forced to work together, they find they have a lot in common.

programme.title: Love Struck Caf√©
programme.desc: An aspiring architect gets the opportunity of a lifetime when she's chosen to develop her home town's lake into an entertainment complex. Unfortunately, to complete the project, she must convince a lifelong friend to leave her family's home.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Taylor opens a time capsule left by her late mother on her birthday. It contains a list of challenges that force her out of her comfort zone, giving her a chance at the possibility of love.

programme.title: Notes of Autumn
programme.desc: A classically trained pianist from the city and her best friend from the country swap homes to recharge their passions.

programme.title: It Was Always You
programme.desc: A woman's engagement plans get thrown into disarray when her fiance's free-spirited brother returns home.

programme.title: Hearts Down Under
programme.desc: A New York restaurant owner inherits a charming cafe in Lemon Myrtle Cove, Australia, where she starts to fall for the cafe's charismatic chef.

programme.title: To Barcelona, With Love
programme.desc: Erica, an American translator, secretly revises a novel set in Barcelona. Everything is fine until bookstore owner Nico invites the credited author, Anna, to the city for a book-signing. Stars Alison Sweeney, Ashley Williams.

programme.title: Love on the Danube: Royal Getaway
programme.desc: A jilted art gallery manager takes her honeymoon cruise solo and meets a charming prince posing as a European gentleman, who shares her passion for art.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche, Dorothy and Sophia cheer up a hospitalized Rose after she becomes ill at a crashed class reunion.

programme.desc: Before waking from surgery, Rose dreams that she, Blanche and Dorothy are 100 years in the future.

programme.desc: Dorothy and Lucas' plot to get even with Blanche leads to a surprise wedding.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz learns of Frasier's marriage to child entertainer Nanny G (Laurie Metcalf) and begs him for tickets; Frasier must resist the physical attraction between him and his ex-wife.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier's clown costume gives his father a mild heart attack. Wendie Malick and Stephanie Faracy guest star.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Competing for her father's attention, Cheyenne announces she is going to pursue a career in dentistry.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Barbra Jean convinces Reba to hack into Kyra's e-mail, they find out she is planning to attend an unsupervised party.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brock lies to Kyra when she asks him about his past drug use; Cheyenne makes a confession to Van about her own brush with drugs.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: A counselor encourages all to share their feelings during a workshop; Reba packs Kyra's things to send to Brock's house.

programme.title: Love on Safari
programme.desc: An American web designer inherits an animal reserve in South Africa. A no-nonsense ranger takes her on a safari in hopes that she will fall in love with the land, the animals and him.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Jenna's First Love
programme.desc: Jenna plans a charity event for Billionaire Tom Redlands. But working with Tom's right hand Andrew is proving difficult, especially since Jenna and Andrew have a romantic history.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Shari's Second Act
programme.desc: Shari just moved back to D.C. after a breakup and hopes to start painting again. Inspiration hits when she meets Evan, a repairman who winds up actually being a gallery owner.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Josh's Third Serving
programme.desc: When after school programs see their funding cut, teachers Josh and Ella turn to fundraising before banding together in search of a larger donation, falling hard along the way.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Kiki's Fourth Ingredient
programme.desc: Kiki is overjoyed and then overwhelmed when she agrees to cater a big wedding. She turns to Clay for support. Together, Kiki and Clay prove that the best ingredient is love.

programme.title: To Barcelona, With Love
programme.desc: Erica, an American translator, secretly revises a novel set in Barcelona. Everything is fine until bookstore owner Nico invites the credited author, Anna, to the city for a book-signing. Stars Alison Sweeney, Ashley Williams.

programme.title: Savoring Paris
programme.desc: Disillusioned with her life, Ella embarks on a soul-searching journey to Paris, navigating love, self-discovery and cheese amid the city's enchanting backdrop.
